_source.short_desc: Tabs3 Software is a reliable, easy-to-use, seamlessly integrated suite of products for legal professionals.
_source.long_desc:
Tabs3 Software is a reliable, easy-to-use, seamlessly integrated suite of products for legal professionals, and consists of Tabs3 Billing, PracticeMaster and Tabs3 Financials. 

Developed with law firms in mind, Tabs3 Software simplifies managing matters, calendars, contacts, and documents. Our Platinum version provides your firm with increased speed, enhanced data reliability, and premium features like Tabs3 Connect, for mobile access. 

Sign up for a personal demo to see Tabs3 in action.
_source.pricing_details: Please contact Tabs3 directly for pricing information.
_source.target_audience: Tabs3 Software is ideal for legal professionals working in solo to mid-sized law firms.

category_features.name: Bankruptcy Case Management
category_features.definition: Management of a legal case related to insolvency of a business or individual

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share multiple calendars

category_features.name: Client Management
category_features.definition: Manage company interactions with current customers

category_features.name: Critical Date Alerts
category_features.definition: Notifications received when deadlines that are coming up

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Electronic Filing
category_features.definition: Transmit documents to regulatory authorities over the web

category_features.name: Exemption Management
category_features.definition: Identify and track situations that legally reduce financial liability

category_features.name: Forms Automation
category_features.definition: Automate repetitive tasks such as filling out information or creating certain types of forms

category_features.name: Legal Forms Library
category_features.definition: Repository of industry-specific forms that can be used as is

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Time Tracking
category_features.definition: Measure time to completion or hours worked

related_products.short_desc: AbacusLaw is a turn-key, fully integrated Case Management Solution for firms of all sizes, in all practice areas and jurisdictions.
related_products.features: AbacusLaw gives you all the tools you need to grow your firm - including case management, time, billing, and full G/L accounting operations. Automatically capture critical case and client details, prevent important deadlines from falling through the cracks, and gain complete visibility into your practice.

related_products.short_desc: iDeals VDR allows investment bankers, lawyers and top managers to exchange and share confidential information through secure deal room.
related_products.features: iDeals is a sophisticated and trusted virtual data room provider. Our experience and exceptional results have been tried and tested by investment bankers, lawyers and top managers of enterprises around the world. As the most result oriented and flexible company in the market we always listen to our customers and offer them the most secure, comfortable and fast solution to achieve their strategic goals in any kind of transaction.

related_products.short_desc: Practice Management software that integrates your information into a single system for improved efficiency and profitability.
related_products.features: Amicus Attorney is an intuitive case management solution that tracks and invoices billable time, automates important documents, and provides easy access to all your clients and case files. Work from your desktop or in the private cloud while integrating with QuickBooks and other applications.

related_products.short_desc: Top-rated bankruptcy project management trusted by over 50,000 professionals. Get a 1:1, customized demo.
related_products.features: Filevine is the #1 most customizable bankruptcy management software. Don't waste your valuable time on a free trial - Filevine is customized to how you do business and adapts to how your team evolves. Exceptional collaboration tools enable your team to focus on what matters, with automatic task assignments, easy reporting, texting, and emailing. Free, unlimited data storage in the cloud.  SOC 2 Type II & HIPPA compliance ensures your data is protected with the best security.

related_products.short_desc: Bankruptcy software for the modern attorney. Web-based app for attorneys to prepare, manage, and file bankruptcy cases online.
related_products.features: NextChapter's web-based bankruptcy software program allows you to prepare Chapter 7, Chapter 11, and Chapter 13 bankruptcy cases on any browser, any device, any time. With intuitive time-saving features, clean design, integrations and firm customizations, NextChapter streamlines everything you need to run your bankruptcy practice in the cloud. Learn why thousands of legal professionals have switched to NextChapter. Try it for free at NextChapterBK.com.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable Practice Management & Bankruptcy Software for the Legal Professionals.
related_products.features: Jubilee is LegalPRO Systems' cloud-based bankruptcy petition preparation and filing platform. It handles personal and business filings in Chapters 7, 11, 12, and 13. Additional robust features include legal payments and invoicing, notice management, and client messaging. LegalPRO has been providing bankruptcy software for over 30 years and provides the best software, service, and support.

related_products.short_desc: Law Office Automation with an eye toward Bankruptcy Practice. Cloud or on premise versions.
related_products.features:
Practice Management and Client Management Software. Incorporates Case Management with accounting integration, permitting billing and invoicing alongside providing calendar management.  It also facilitates document management, library management.
This software is designed specifically for attorneys and provides practice management with accounting.
We specialize in Consumer Bankruptcy.
Automatically post Court and Client Emails
On Line Calendar Integration

similar_products.short_desc: Clio provides a powerful suite of tools to help modern legal professionals run, grow, and manage their firms from intake to invoice.
similar_products.features: Clio eases the day-to-day of legal professionals all over the world with intuitive time tracking, billing, matter management, mobile apps, and more to streamline every task from client intake to invoice. With Clio Manage, the world's most popular legal practice management software, and Clio Grow, a legal CRM platform designed to help you better manage your client relationships, the Clio Suite provides everything you need to run, grow, and manage your law firm.

similar_products.short_desc: New realities call for new solutions. We are the #1 time and billing, and payments software for law firms. Try for FREE now.
similar_products.features: At HALF THE COST of other solutions, TimeSolv provides the robust time and billing needs law firms demand, without the extra features you never use. Store payment information using TimeSolvPay and run hundreds of payments in seconds on YOUR timeline, achieving ZERO AR! For over 20 years, our web-based solution has helped lawyers increase their billable time and get paid faster, whether at home or in the office. Integrate with LawPay, QuickBooks, Office 365, and more. Try for FREE for 30 days!

similar_products.short_desc: Professional services automation software that helps firms with project management, time tracking, billing, reporting, and accounting
similar_products.features: BigTime is a leading Professional Services Automation (PSA) software that helps you scale your business by giving you the ability to track and act on your operational metrics. Even with remote work, easily manage time, expenses, and billing for multiple projects all at once, and quickly identify areas of opportunity with advanced features like resource allocation and custom reporting. With BigTime Wallet and client portal, you can get paid faster using custom invoicing and payment processing.

similar_products.short_desc: BQE CORE makes it easier & more profitable to run your firm by automating repetitive tasks & delivering real-time actionable insights.
similar_products.features: BQE's powerful all-in-one platform and expert support give A & E firms the intuitive tools they need to meet the demands of their firm, empower their team, maximize profitability, and deliver superior results to clients. Designed for the A&E industry by architects and engineers BQE CORE makes it easier & more profitable to run your firm by automating repetitive tasks & delivering real-time actionable insights.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile friendly and secure legal software that's easy to learn and use. Save time. Grow your firm. Go paperless. Work from anywhere.
similar_products.features: PracticePanther is the top rated law practice management software on Capterra! See why tens of thousands of law firms in over 170 countries use PracticePanther to automate their workflows and get more done in less time. Never miss deadlines, get paid faster, seamlessly track billable time & expenses. Work from anywhere, on any device, with our mobile app. It's easy, user-friendly and intuitive. Spend less time managing your firm and more time making money. Try it free, no credit card needed.

similar_products.short_desc: MyCase is a top-rated, complete law practice management solution with all the tools firms need to run a better practice, from anywhere.
similar_products.features: MyCase is a top-rated, end-to-end law practice management software that helps firms run efficiently from anywhere, provide an exceptional client experience, and easily track firm performance. Streamline day-to-day firm processes in one, easy to adopt solution -- lead tracking, client intake, case management, eSignature, billing, payments and more. Start your free trial (no credit card required) today!

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 Cloud Accounting & Financial Management System. Achieve real-time visibility, drive efficiency, and scale with confidence.
similar_products.features: Choose the flexible and scalable financial platform that delivers deep accounting capabilities, including payroll, tax filings, and inventory tracking tools, across multiple industries designed with a single aim-to accelerate your success. Small to medium-sized businesses prefer Sage Intacct for its ease of use, integrated multi-dimensional reporting, high customer satisfaction, dedicated support, and more. Maximize impact and future-proof your business with a partner who can scale with you.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Debt Collection software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Debt Collection tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Debt Collection software automates the management and accounting process for overdue invoices on behalf of an organization or a specialized collection agency. Debt Collection applications can integrate with existing accounting and invoicing systems. Debt Collection software is related to Accounting software, Banking Systems software and Billing and Invoicing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Docketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Docketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Docketing software helps law firms and court clerks track court cases, active litigation, and related documentation.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Forms Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Forms Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Law Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Law Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Law Practice Management software integrates and automates the front and back office activities of legal practices including: calendar management, appointment scheduling, case management, conflict checking, messaging, and more. These applications also often provide integrated solutions for time management, billing and collections as well as accounting. Law Practice Management solutions also provide tools for workflow and document management, marketing and inquiry tracking as well as distributing key data throughout the organization and across multiple office locations. Law Practice Management software is related to Legal Billing software, Legal Case Management software and Professional Services Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Billing software automates time tracking, billing, calendaring and accounting for law practices. These applications facilitate legal-style hourly billing and recording of case-related expenses. Many Legal Billing solutions also feature integration for a broad range of case and workflow management tools as well as accounting and payroll features across multiple office locations. Legal Billing software is related to Law Practice Management software, Professional Services Automation software and Time and Expense software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Calendar software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Calendar tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Calendar software helps attorneys to manage their schedules. These applications allow users to schedule events and appointments, set deadline reminders and notifies of any conflicts. Legal Calendar software is related to Court Management software, Law Practice Management software, Legal Billing software and Legal Case Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Case Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Case Management software coordinates documents, scheduling, conflicts, contacts, and reporting associated with legal cases. These applications enable an integrated solution to automate case management, client history tracking, and contracts as well as billing and accounting. Legal Case Management solutions also often include database management, electronic discovery, and automatic document template editing features, enabling organizations to manage, distribute, and update key case-related data. Legal Case Management software is related to Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software and Legal Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Document Management software allows legal professionals to organize and quickly access electronically-stored legal documents. Scanning, imaging, and merging allow these documents to be included in a database that is searchable and sortable in any number of ways. This type of software can also allow for transcript and transcription management. Legal Document Management software is related to Document Management software, Legal Case Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Court Management software.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime.

Used by over 4.5 million customers, QuickBooks provides smart tools for your business, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage expenses, send invoices, track inventory, and even run payroll. With QuickBooks Online, you can get organized, save time, and even get paid fast by adding payment features. Best of all, you can try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: Collaborate on projects, track time, manage expenses and invoice your customers. Available in the cloud, from any device!

Run a better legal practice with streamlined collaboration, easy time & expense tracking and online invoicing. 

Avaza is an all-in-one solution for project management, resource scheduling, tracking time, managing expenses, quotes & invoices. Teams of all sizes, from freelancers to large businesses, will love it, for its simple & intuitive design with powerful features. Available in the cloud, from any device.

related_products.short_desc: AbacusLaw generates professional, polished invoices for any fee arrangement and billing schedule.
related_products.features: AbacusLaw will improve your cash flow by invoicing and collecting from clients so you can focus on your business. Founded in 1983, AbacusLaw can handle all billing aspects including time, trust accounting, general ledger, payroll, accounts payable and receivable, check writing, financial statements, court rules, auto-fill court PDF forms, cases, conflicts, contacts, dockets, docs, emails, files and more. Also available in our private cloud for a complete disaster-proof solution.

related_products.short_desc: CosmoLex is the only cloud-based, total practice management, billing, and accounting system (no QuickBooks? required).
related_products.features: Thousands of law firms have switched to CosmoLex as it is the only cloud-based practice management software with built-in compliant legal accounting (no QuickBooks? required). The one price, one login CosmoLex system eliminates the constant struggle of juggling multiple platforms to handle law practice management, billing, and accounting. CosmoLex also includes built-in LawPay with no fixed monthly fee. CosmoLex offers everything you need to run your entire law practice. Try free today!

related_products.short_desc: LEAP is legal billing software for solo and small law firms to generate bills quickly and easily and reduce billing errors.
related_products.features: LEAP is legal billing software for solo and small law firms wishing to become more efficient, more productive and make more money. Use LEAP to generate bills quickly and easily and minimize billing errors. LEAP Legal Billing integrates seamlessly with QuickBooks. Other important features include hourly rate and flat-fee billing options, instant time capture and the ability to create matter related invoices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Law Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Law Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. related_categories.description: Law Practice Management software integrates and automates the front and back office activities of legal practices including: calendar management, appointment scheduling, case management, conflict checking, messaging, and more. These applications also often provide integrated solutions for time management, billing and collections as well as accounting. Law Practice Management solutions also provide tools for workflow and document management, marketing and inquiry tracking as well as distributing key data throughout the organization and across multiple office locations. Law Practice Management software is related to Legal Billing software, Legal Case Management software and Professional Services Automation software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. related_categories.description: Legal Case Management software coordinates documents, scheduling, conflicts, contacts, and reporting associated with legal cases. These applications enable an integrated solution to automate case management, client history tracking, and contracts as well as billing and accounting. Legal Case Management solutions also often include database management, electronic discovery, and automatic document template editing features, enabling organizations to manage, distribute, and update key case-related data. Legal Case Management software is related to Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software and Legal Billing software.
